product_name: Guardian Clip Knife and Mini Tool - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This tactically inspired clip folding knife and multitool set keeps a multitude of essentials compact in your pack, readying you for long-mileage backcountry battles and deep off-the-map backpacking.
short_description: This tactically inspired clip folding knife and multitool set keeps a multitude of essentials compact in your pack, readying you for long-mileage backcountry battles and deep off-the-map backpacking.
